render

(
  • templateName
  • templateData
)
String

Defined in src/utils/TemplateUtil.js:31

Loads or fetches template file from cache, renders it using underscore template method and returns a html string

Parameters:

  • templateName String

    The filename of the template without the file extension

  • templateData Object

    The data to be passed to the template method

Returns:

String:

The final html string

Properties

BASE_URI

String static

Defined in src/utils/TemplateUtil.js:22

The base URI to use if it differs from the location of the application

PATH

String static

Defined in src/utils/TemplateUtil.js:13

The default location of the template files relative to the root of the application server
